summary: Ward spell that gives you the edge you need in high difficulties !
descriptionHtml:
(balanced version added for high lvl players ) = ( 10 magicka cost per second , 50 armor , 100 ward power , 5 healing per second )

i have deadly dragons installed and it is nearly impossible for me to win with a mage , even the greatest ward breaks , and they eat me with the second attack ... soo i made this ..
and this is my first mod, so go easy ..

u can buy it from riverwood , or any ward selling mage !!! 

THIS SPELL WILL NOT GET ANY BOOST FROM YOUR PERK\'S LIKE SPELL COST OR WARD BOOST 

Ward cost\'s 2 magicka per second  

gives you 500 armor ( with max 80% armor cap , means 500 damage dragon bite will still do 100 damage ) 

500 ward power (almost unbreakable ) 

3 healing per second ... ( to get some of ur really low HP back , if u r playing a mage )

it may seems overpowers , but its not with high difficulties and if you are using deadly dragons  ...

i am new to modding , so give me a feedback if you see any NPC mage\'s using this (i am sure they won\'t , but still )

thanks to King1Nathan for main file 

sorry for the typo\'s .
author: ArrowBringer
